TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 代表可當成子項目集合捲動式容器使用的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.
The children of this element support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)如需範例，可能會實作此控制項模式的控制項。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

related.span: UI 自動化控制項模式概觀

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 用戶端的 UI 自動化控制項模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須介於與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果已取得使用、 它只快取的資料，包含並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用來取得快取先前使用指定的屬性值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用屬性和其用法，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontallyScrollableProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞至函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]子系的根，並滿足一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalScrollPercentProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞至函式會傳回目前的內容區域內可檢視區域的水平和垂直捲動百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalViewSizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式會傳回目前的垂直和水平大小，可檢視區域的總計內容區域的百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

span.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 值-1，可取代欄位。The value -1 can be substituted for the field. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自然後使用捲動內容區域頂端可檢視區域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 這類模式識別項傳遞給方法來擷取從指定的控制項模式感興趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: public void Scroll (System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount);
.method public hidebysig instance void Scroll(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount) cil managed
Public Sub Scroll (horizontalAmount As ScrollAmount, verticalAmount As ScrollAmount)

param.name: horizontalAmount
param.span: 控制項特定的水平增量。

span.span: The horizontal increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果無法以這個方向捲動控制項，則應傳入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalAmount
param.span: 控制項特定的垂直增量。

span.span: The vertical increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果無法以這個方向捲動控制項，則應傳入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 水平和垂直捲動內容區域的可見區域。

span.span: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自然後使用水平或垂直捲動項目要求的數量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the element a requested amount either horizontally or vertically. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#106)]

exception.span: 控制項支援水平或垂直捲動專有的 值，但傳入 值。

span.span: A control supports values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a value is passed in.

exception.span: 嘗試以不支援的方向捲動。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetScrollPercent (double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetScrollPercent(float64 horizontalPercent, float64 verticalPercent) cil managed
Public Sub SetScrollPercent (horizontalPercent As Double, verticalPercent As Double)
public: void SetScrollPercent(double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);

param.name: horizontalPercent
param.span: 總水平內容區域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

param.span: 如果無法以這個方向捲動控制項，則應傳入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalPercent
param.span: 總垂直內容區域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

param.span: 如果無法以這個方向捲動控制項，則應傳入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 設定水平和/或垂直捲動位置，此值以其在 內總內容區域的百分比來表示。

span.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大於顯示區域控制項的內容區域時，這個方法才有用。This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region. 傳入值指出已不在指定的方向捲動。Passing in the value indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自然後使用捲動內容區域的最上層左 'home' 的位置可檢視區域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top left 'home' position of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: 傳入的值無法轉換成雙精度浮點數。

span.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

exception.span: 傳入的值大於 100 或小於 0 (-1 例外，因為它相當於 )。

span.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

exception.span: 和 的值標準化為 0% 或 100%。

span.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

exception.span: 嘗試以不支援的方向捲動。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
